title: Clinical Fellows Complex Case Webinars
description: Discover training fellowships and tools and resources to support your practice, including insurance appeal letters and Social Security Disability application guides.
cleaned_text: Maria Antonietta Mazzola, MD - University of Massachusetts Medical School and Lindsay Ross, MD - Cleveland Clinic Foundation. Anti-DPPX antibody encephalitis, CRMP5 by Jackqueline Koshorek, DO - Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine and Ghazal Lashgari, MD - Cedars Sinai Medical Center. S1P receptors in MS management, mitochondrial disorders (Leber hereditary optic neuropathy). [April 12, 2022](https://www.youtube.com/embed/1FvoQLlAOOs) - Presented by Neda Sattarnezhad, MD - Stanford University and Alex Simpson, MD - Johns Hopkins University. Differential diagnosis, CASPR2 antibody disorder, low-risk CLL, listeria monocytogenes. [March 22, 2022](https://www.youtube.com/embed/MXDaKXTtd10) - Presented Mahadeen, MD - Cleveland Clinic and Gina Perez-Giraldo - Northwestern Medicine. Differential diagnosis, infectious disease, CNS vasculitis.
